title: Fallen Timbers Battlefield and Fort Miamis National Historic Site: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Listed below are featured attractions that the whole family can enjoy. Whatever you choose to do, remember to take some time to relax and enjoy your time discovering Ohio history!  Historical programs at Fallen Timbers are listed and searchable at www.MetroparksToledo.com.  Visit other nearby attractions.   .
